https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ct48GoWruYY9xM34wUXPnqD7tUc.jpg Aadhi, a smart and suave smuggler in Bangkok, falls in love with a waitress. However, he finds himself in trouble when she frames him for all the crimes committed by his look-alike, Bhagavan. Ameerin Aadhi Bhagavan
